name: Scent of Wood ("Houtgeur")
description:
Auction #1 - 006
Artist: Cobalus (Andreas Valkenborgh) - www.cobalus.xyz 
Series: Abstracts
Year: 2016
Size: 180cm x 80cm (70.9in x 31,5in)
Note: triptych - 3 paintings of identical size: 60cm x 80cm (23,62in x 31,5in)

Cobalus' collection Abstracts is a diverse series of paintings with geometric shapes and a color palette that often has a 70's feel to it. Some of these paintings are - however - remarkably different and don't entirely fit that box. 'Scent of Wood' is a perfect example. This particular painting is a tribute to his father and grandfather, both artisan woodworkers who owned a furniture store in Peer until his father's untimely death in 1974. 'Scent of Wood' honors this legacy, tells the story of a childhood in which wood was omnipresent and vital.

EXTRA: The first owner of this NFT will receive 2 WIP-NFT's (Work-in-Progress) to add more value and authenticity to their purchase/investment. https://www.hicetnunc.xyz/objkt/442241 & https://www.hicetnunc.xyz/objkt/442247
